body: Finally finished #redecorating the #livingroom! What do you guys think? #homedecor #interiordesign

comments.body: This looks so cozy! Love the color scheme. Where did you get that rug?
@23232 Thanks! Got the rug from a little local shop. It really ties the room together, right?
@12121 Totally! It adds the perfect pop of color.
I’m loving those shelves! Did you build them yourself?
@34343 I wish! They’re from IKEA, but I did put them together, so that counts for something, right?
@12121 Haha, totally counts! They look great.
Those plants in the corner are such a nice touch! Are they real?
@45454 Thanks! They’re real, but honestly, I’m surprised they’ve survived this long. I’m not the best plant parent!
Love the vibe! What kind of lighting are you using? The room has such a warm glow.
@56565 It’s all about the dimmable lights and a couple of floor lamps with soft bulbs. Makes it feel super relaxing in the evenings.
Can I just say, I’m obsessed with that coffee table! Where did you get it?
@67676 Got it from a vintage market! It was a steal, and I couldn’t pass it up.
